Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sa.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sa.abstract: Called after the controller’s view is loaded into memory. Initializes the central manager and sets up the table view.

Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@CM@Ble_S.name: tableView(_:numberOfRowsInSection:)
Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@CM@Ble_S.abstract: Returns the number of rows (Bluetooth devices) in the specified section.

Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@CM@Ble_S.name: tableView(_:cellForRowAt:)
Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@CM@Ble_S.abstract: Provides a cell object for the specified row in the table view.

Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@CM@Ble_S.name: tableView(_:didSelectRowAt:)
Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@CM@Ble_S.abstract: Tells the delegate that the specified row is now selected and connects to the selected peripheral.

Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@CM@Ble_S.name: centralManagerDidUpdateState(_:)
Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@CM@Ble_S.abstract: Called whenever the central manager’s state is updated. Starts scanning for peripherals if Bluetooth is powered on.

Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@CM@Ble_S.name: centralManager(_:didDiscover:advertisementData:rssi:)
Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@CM@Ble_S.abstract: Called when a peripheral is discovered during scanning.

Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@CM@Ble_S.name: centralManager(_:didConnect:)
Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@CM@Ble_S.abstract: Called when a connection is successfully made to a peripheral. Sets the peripheral’s delegate and discovers its services.

Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@CM@Ble_S.name: peripheral(_:didDiscoverServices:)
Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@CM@Ble_S.abstract: Tells the delegate that the peripheral has discovered the services it supports.

Classes/ServicesViewController.html#/c:@.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/ServicesViewController.html#/c:@.abstract: Called after the controller’s view is loaded into memory. Sets up the table view and initiates service discovery on the peripheral.

Classes/ServicesViewController.html#/c:@.name: tableView(_:numberOfRowsInSection:)
Classes/ServicesViewController.html#/c:@.abstract: Returns the number of rows (services) in the specified section.

Classes/ServicesViewController.html#/c:@.name: tableView(_:cellForRowAt:)
Classes/ServicesViewController.html#/c:@.abstract: Provides a cell object for the specified row in the table view.

Classes/ServicesViewController.html#/c:@.name: tableView(_:didSelectRowAt:)
Classes/ServicesViewController.html#/c:@.abstract: Tells the delegate that the specified row is now selected and navigates to the characteristics view controller.

Classes/ServicesViewController.html#/c:@.name: peripheral(_:didDiscoverServices:)
Classes/ServicesViewController.html#/c:@.abstract: Tells the delegate that the peripheral has discovered the services it supports.

Classes/SceneDelegate.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sam.name: scene(_:willConnectTo:options:)
Classes/SceneDelegate.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sam.abstract: This method is called when a scene is being added to the app.

Classes/SceneDelegate.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sam.name: sceneDidDisconnect(_:)
Classes/SceneDelegate.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sam.abstract: This method is called as the scene is being released by the system.

Classes/SceneDelegate.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sam.name: sceneDidBecomeActive(_:)
Classes/SceneDelegate.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sam.abstract: This method is called when the scene has moved from an inactive state to an active state.

Classes/SceneDelegate.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sam.name: sceneWillResignActive(_:)
Classes/SceneDelegate.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sam.abstract: This method is called when the scene will move from an active state to an inactive state.

Classes/SceneDelegate.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sam.name: sceneWillEnterForeground(_:)
Classes/SceneDelegate.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sam.abstract: This method is called as the scene transitions from the background to the foreground.

Classes/SceneDelegate.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sam.name: sceneDidEnterBackground(_:)
Classes/SceneDelegate.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sam.abstract: This method is called as the scene transitions from the foreground to the background.

Classes/NotifiedValueViewController.html.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/NotifiedValueViewController.html.abstract: Called after the controller’s view is loaded into memory. Sets up the table view and initiates service discovery on the peripheral.

Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.abstract: Called after the controller’s view is loaded into memory.

Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.name: sendLoginSuccessful()
Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.abstract: Sends a predefined login successful message to the peripheral.

Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.name: sendHeartbeat()
Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.abstract: Sends a predefined heartbeat message to the peripheral.

Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.name: sendChargerRestart()
Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.abstract: Sends a predefined charger restart message to the peripheral.

Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.name: handleState(state:)
Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.abstract: Handles the state based on the provided characteristic UUID.

Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.name: tableView(_:numberOfRowsInSection:)
Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.abstract: Returns the number of rows (characteristics) in the specified section.

Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.name: tableView(_:cellForRowAt:)
Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.abstract: Provides a cell object for the specified row in the table view.

Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.name: tableView(_:didSelectRowAt:)
Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.abstract: Tells the delegate that the specified row is now selected.

Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.name: peripheral(_:didDiscoverCharacteristicsFor:error:)
Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.abstract: Tells the delegate that the peripheral has discovered characteristics of a specified service.

Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.name: peripheral(_:didWriteValueFor:error:)
Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.abstract: Tells the delegate that a specified characteristic’s value has been written.

Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.name: peripheral(_:didUpdateValueFor:error:)
Classes/CharacteristicsViewController.ht.abstract: Tells the delegate that the peripheral has updated the value for a characteristic.

Classes/BLEManager.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sample.name: init()
Classes/BLEManager.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sample.abstract: Initializes a new instance of the BLEManager class.

Classes/BLEManager.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sample.name: centralManagerDidUpdateState(_:)
Classes/BLEManager.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sample.abstract: Called whenever the central manager’s state is updated.

Classes/BLEManager.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sample.name: centralManager(_:didDiscover:advertisementData:rssi:)
Classes/BLEManager.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sample.abstract: Called when a peripheral is discovered during scanning.

Classes/BLEManager.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sample.name: centralManager(_:didConnect:)
Classes/BLEManager.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sample.abstract: Called when a connection is successfully made to a peripheral.

Classes/BLEManager.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sample.name: peripheral(_:didDiscoverServices:)
Classes/BLEManager.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sample.abstract: Called when the peripheral discovers the services it supports.

Classes/BLEManager.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sample.name: peripheral(_:didDiscoverCharacteristicsFor:error:)
Classes/BLEManager.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sample.abstract: Called when the peripheral discovers the characteristics of a specified service.

Classes/BLEManager.html#/s:10Ble_Sample1.name: sendData(_:)
Classes/BLEManager.html#/s:10Ble_Sample1.abstract: Sends data to the connected peripheral using the writable characteristic.

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sampl.name: application(_:didFinishLaunchingWithOptions:)
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sampl.abstract: This method is called after the application has launched and is used for initial setup.

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sampl.name: application(_:configurationForConnecting:options:)
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sampl.abstract: This method is called when a new scene session is being created.

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sampl.name: application(_:didDiscardSceneSessions:)
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Ble_Sampl.abstract: This method is called when the user discards a scene session.
